metadataAttributes.Title: Strategic Leadership and Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Leadership and Business Skill for Immediate Impact. Apply practical strategies to becoming an effective organizational leader.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Strategic Management, Negotiation, Leadership, Business Strategy, self-awareness, Ethical decision-making, Defining Leadership, Trust in relationships, Leadership Development, Develop team culture, Navigate growth and change in teams, Create space for DEIB,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Elizabeth A. Luckman ,Kari Keating ,Denise Lewin Loyd ,Michael Bednar ,E. Geoffrey Love ,Deepak Somaya ,Joe Mahoney ,Jeff Flesher ,
